forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 66. West northwest wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
